name: SearsService
0:
”Alexa ask Sears Service to report problem air conditioner is not cooling”
”Alexa tell Sears Service to request service because dishwasher is not cleaning”
”Alexa tell Sears Service I need fabric softener”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sears service
des:
The Sears Service skill can be used to either to request service for a Sears appliance, or to request a refill of a product for a Sears appliance. The first time you use this skill, please login to the skill with the email you use for your Amazon account. 

If you don't have an account in the Sears system using the same email that you use with your Amazon account, then Sears will contact you by email to get your contact information to process your request.
